posts.name: Fedor Indutny
posts.cooked:
Hello everyone! The Signal team is releasing a new version of Signal Desktop, v7.79.0-beta.1. If youre interested in participating, join the beta here.

Release notes:

  • We updated the appearance and stylistic consistency of scrollbars throughout the app. Usually if you scroll too fast you might miss something, but in this case scrolling is the only way to see it.
  • Copy/paste improvements make it easier to select-all and replace existing text without inheriting the old formatting. Thanks, @brianHarder!

Commit changes: Comparing v7.78.0-beta.1v7.79.0-beta.1 路 signalapp/Signal-Desktop 路 GitHub

link_counts.title: Comparing v7.78.0-beta.1...v7.79.0-beta.1 路 signalapp/Signal-Desktop 路 GitHub

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.79.0-beta.1

59 new commits since 7.78.0-beta.1:

Show commits

  • v7.79.0-alpha.1 [1]

  • Remove invalid quotes from conversation [2]

  • Ensure last message text is always updated [3]

  • Fix reference to build-localized-display-names script [4]

  • Simplify edit handling of attachments [5]

  • Fix initial all chats folder params [6]

  • Use v2 endpoints for groups WebAPI [7]

  • Find by username: Don't automatically add .01 discriminator [8]

  • Improve calling preload script [9]

  • Upgrade electron to 38.4.0, electron-builder to 26.1.0 [10]

  • Add message preview for polls [11]

  • Fix app icon for Linux adhoc builds [12]

  • Revert electron-builder to 26.0.14 [13]

  • Avoid incorrect use of preload cache [14]

  • Fix badge counts for include muted setting [15]

  • Import WindowsNotifications unconditionally [16]

  • Exclude our own conversation from connection count [17]

  • Allow .tsx files to be .std.tsx [18]

  • Init AxoAlertDialog [19]

  • Update emoji-picker-react in sticker creator [20]

  • Fix uncaught error in AttachmentCrypto [21]

  • Use emoji sheet with fallback [22]

  • Show draftTimestamp in left pane preview [23]

  • Notification Profiles: Exclude silenced conversations from badge count [24]

  • Fix chat folder settings title when editing folder [25]

  • Fix backup group update test cases [26]

  • Chat folder fixes [27]

  • Temporarily downgrade libsignal from 0.85.1 to 0.83.0 [28]

  • Fix scrollbar styles across the app [29]

  • Show contact modal on click when reviewing [30]

  • Run test-release in a temporary folder [31]

  • Fix typing indicators for 1:1 conversations [32]

  • Update release notes [33]

  • Update strings [34]

  • Update DNS fallback [35]

  • Fix lint [36]

  • [signalapp/Signal-Desktop#7512] Improve copy-paste formatting inheritance [37]

  • Ensure reactions are handled in order [38]

  • Refactor backup import/export options [39]

  • Fix freeze in mute-state-change [40]

  • Fix reply/quoting breaking for poll messages [41]

  • Disable redux action logging by default [42]

  • Poll create modal [43]

  • Allow poll questions to be searchable [44]

  • Prevent editing or forwarding polls [45]

  • Fix multiple choice polls to use unique voters as denominator [46]

  • Update to RingRTC v2.59.3 [47]

  • Fix non-qualified emoji values rendering as emoji in composer [48]

  • Fix order of muteStateChange update [49]

  • ConversationController: Send changes to redux only if conversation in lookups [50]

  • Use binary proto fields in staging [51]

  • Update to RingRTC v2.59.4 [52]

  • Add backup support for polls [53]

  • Fix spacing when a View Once message is viewed [54]

  • Update poll receive feature flags) [55]

  • Chat folders: for unread, check setting and active notification profile [56]

  • Release notes for 7.79 [57]

  • Update strings [58]

  • 7.79.0-beta.1 [59]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Desktop v7.78.0-beta.1v7.79.0-beta.1

posts.cooked:
When replying to a file or receiving a reply to a file, there is an empty space where an icon of a document sits on the Android version. Not sure if this bug appeared in this beta version.

How it looks on desktop:

image217126 1.6 KB

How it looks on Android:

image389229 9.82 KB

posts.name: Whatnoww
posts.cooked:
Desktop cant restore my media. Its been stuck on 2GB out of the total of more than 20GB for over a day with no progress.

https://debuglogs.org/desktop/7.79.0-beta.1/90a830239f25312481039cde5cc5605c504473c23acd7536a2fa86152f16f91f.gz

Why is there also a mismatch in the size of the restore? Desktop is reporting almost 10GB of extra media restore than Signal Android is reporting as backup size.

Im going to try to relink.

Is it possible to speak privately about Cloud Backups with someone? Ive found something Im not sure about, but dont want to mention publicly. I know Grayson mentioned something related to it in the past.
